frontmatter.title: Approach with development perspective
frontmatter.description: Make things better. The world will not call upon the unseen potential. Find new stories.

frontmatter.title: Identify common feelings
frontmatter.description: Division is the easy way. Go beyond, find commonalities, build new connections.

frontmatter.title: Accept reality, act deliberately
frontmatter.description: Don't try to squeeze productivity in. Use time with family well, choose how to spend time, and act deliberately.

frontmatter.title: Rebuild stronger
frontmatter.description: When forced to rebuild work, take time to improve the next time around. Strengthen the weaknesses that lead to the problems first, and look for additional opportunities next. Use the insight gained to build with new ideas in mind. It's a frustrating process and there's no point in doing it again if it will lead to further problems.

frontmatter.title: Defending data
frontmatter.description: Defend it because it has internal value, regardless of perceived value from others. Don't give opportunity for others to control vital parts. Make it more trouble than it's worth.

frontmatter.title: Humans seek a hidden meaning
frontmatter.description: Computers generally don't look beyond the surface, both a strength and weakness. Find ways to meld the two, to provide people with stories to go with information & data.

frontmatter.title: Bigger strides
frontmatter.description: Utilize the time effectively by taking swings in areas that look like potential opportunities. Make the swings worthwhile, and go after the right opportunities.

frontmatter.title: Task at hand
frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus and become distracted. Real changes have occurred, causing plans to change. Adjust, reassess, then focus on the task at hand.

frontmatter.title: Smoky conditions during a pandemic
frontmatter.description: smoky late summer. interrupts outdoor escapes. oh, the pandemic.

frontmatter.title: Bringing Main Street online
frontmatter.description: Marketplaces should not be for the benefit of one. Find the best qualities of real world marketplaces, then bring those online. Digital commerce is still in early innings.
